name: grist-mcp-server

long_description: Read and write tables, records, pages, and widgets. Works with Grist Cloud or self-hosted instances.

grist_api_key.title: Grist API Key
grist_api_key.description: Your Grist API key. Visit https://docs.getgrist.com/settings/keys to create one.

grist_base_url.title: Grist Base URL
grist_base_url.description: Base URL for your Grist instance. Use https://docs.getgrist.com for Grist Cloud or your self-hosted URL.

enable_debug_mode.description: Enable detailed logging and diagnostics. Automatically sets log level to 'debug' and enables tool call logging.

enable_metrics.title: Performance Metrics
enable_metrics.description: Collect and log performance statistics every 60 seconds.

tools.name: grist_create_document
